title: Gamification and WebQuest-Based Language Teacher Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental language education theories and experience with ICT (Information and Communication Technology) integration
context.additional_context: A language teacher training program emphasizing collaboration and problem-solving activities using digital devices.

learning_goals: Participants can explain the webquest design process incorporating gamification elements.
Participants can develop three or more inquiry-driven webquest activities that promote exploratory learning.
Participants can implement and evaluate language education scenarios in team-based virtual environments.
Participants can propose two or more strategies for improving academic achievement using digital resources.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
